channel.title: In Game Banning
channel.description: You guys should not ban a player in the middle of the game. If you decide to ban them you should wait until the end of the game. It ruins the game for their teammates. Especially when they're the CL. Thanks for that though. Not counterproductive at all

item.title: In Game Banning
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Better idea, don’t go and get yourself banned in the first place

Read full topic

item.title: In Game Banning
item.dc:creator: BDMeansBraindead
item.description:
A lot of other games ban you after your match ends so it doesn’t screw over your teammates. They want to promote people not leaving, but actively kicking people from a match because of a different issue shouldn’t be how it’s done. Just ban after. It’s that simple

Read full topic

item.title: In Game Banning
item.dc:creator: xtxownage
item.description:
Depending on what they did, it’s kinda like telling valve to hold off of banning someone in tf2 until the match ends because that guy just so happened to be carrying.

Read full topic
